title: Yonrith Lovakengj

properties.name: description
properties.value: Yonrith Lovakengj was a dwarf, who lived during the Third Age. He was leader of an army allied with Saradomin and fought against the Zarosians at Lassar during the God Wars. Yonrith apparently fled and left most of his army behind, likely because he were pursued by the Carnifex Maximus Vardorvis.

content:
Yonrith Lovakengj was a dwarf, who lived during the Third Age. He was leader of an army allied with Saradomin and fought against the Zarosians at Lassar during the God Wars. Yonrith apparently fled and left most of his army behind, likely because he were pursued by the Carnifex Maximus Vardorvis.

Lady Lovakengj, in issue 23 of the Postbag from the Hedge, confirms that Yonrith founded Lovakengj, and also noted that he was a great military commander, though not a great smith.[1]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Postbag 23 - "Transcript:Spooky Mahjarrat, Cabbage Mages, and Spots (A Good Boy!)", 6, by Lady Vulcana Lovakengj. Old School RuneScape Postbags from the Hedge. "Oh, Yonrith Lovakengj? He was our founder, you know. He was a great military commander, or so the story goes. Not much talent in Smithing though."
rawContent:
'''Yonrith Lovakengj''' was a [[dwarf]], who lived during the [[Third Age]]. He was leader of an army allied with [[Saradomin]] and fought against the [[Zaros]]ians at [[Lassar]] during the [[God Wars]]. Yonrith apparently fled and left most of his army behind, likely because he were pursued by the Carnifex Maximus [[Vardorvis]]. 

[[Lady Vulcana Lovakengj|Lady Lovakengj]], in issue 23 of the [[Postbag from the Hedge]], confirms that Yonrith founded Lovakengj, and also noted that he was a great military commander, though not a great smith.{{CitePostbag|issue=23|author=[[Lady Vulcana Lovakengj]]|letter=6|quote=Oh, Yonrith Lovakengj? He was our founder, you know. He was a great military commander, or so the story goes. Not much talent in Smithing though.}}
